title: a question about runeterra lore
body:
Do all the champions we have now exist in the same time period? Like could sivir travel to piltover and meet vi and caitlyn? 
or are some of the champion we have are already dead like theyre not around in runeterra presently but have existed in the past.
ive been wondering about this for some time now.

replies.body: Seems likely that everyone's in the same time period; that's how it was with the old lore and likely how it remains. What "modern day" means for Runeterra though is anyone's guess.

Well in the current lore there has been crossovers between Shurima and Noxus. Noxus and Demacia. Noxus and Ionia. Demacia and Targon. Bilgewater and Noxus. Bilgewater and the Creepy Ghost Isles whose name I forgot.  Bilgewater and Freljord. Piltover and Zaun. Noxus and Zaun. And wherever Nami’s from and Targon. 

So it’s looking like it’s all at the same time.
It's all happening in the modern day apart from events like Azir's Ascension, Taliyah and Yasuo's meeting and Aurelion Sol's Twin Dawns story
Its in the same timeline, each faction is unique and they interact with each other
It's all in the same time period.
